LongDescription:
Let it Snow, Let it Snow, Let it Snow! 
 SnowyTV overlays a snow effect in all of your favorite apps! 
 Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays! 
 Follow me on Twitter (@iKilledAppl3), 
 Donate via PayPal (https://paypal.me/iKilledAppl3). 
 Support me on Patreon! (https://www.patreon.com/iKilledAppl3) 
 Changelog: 
 Version 1.0 - Release. 
 Version 1.0.1 - Fixed a bug where the snow would overlay on the tvOS 13 Control Center 
 Fixes a bug where the Jingle Bells song wouldn't play on the Homescreen while Use In All Apps was enabled. 
 Fixes a bug where the tweaks' Settings wouldn't update correctly.
 The Jingle Bells song now plays on loop. 
 Version 1.0.2-1 adds fall options. 
 Version 1.0.3-1 Fixes a bug with the leaves overlay.
